properties.description: this pipeline extracts data from saleslt.address table and loads that data into saleslt.address_destination table.

scriptLines: select1 derive(Description = case(SubTotal > 10000, 'Subtotal is greater than 10k','Subtotal is less than or equal to 10k')) ~> derivedColumn1
